graph.original_query: Create a dark-themed, modern multi-page landing website using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN (no build tools), with 4 pages: index.html (hero with fullscreen background image from picsum.photos (to get 200x300 image use: https://picsum.photos/200/300) or placeholder.com, features, testimonials, CTA, footer with social icons), about.html (mission statement, timeline or values, team cards), products.html (6â€“8 product/service cards in a grid with title, description, image, price, optional filters), and contact.html (contact form with name/email/message, map placeholder or location card, support links), using consistent dark mode theme, responsive layout, shared header/footer, no lorem ipsum, proper meta tags and titles, and only HTML/CSS/JS. Call CoderAgent atleast 9-10 times for different exhaustive but specific tasks as this is a detailed project. Remember CoderAgent is stateless and can't see other outputs. So you will have to be very specific. Make sure it actually LINKS all the generated file properly in ALL headers.

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Created a basic HTML structure with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links, applying a dark theme.
globals_schema.execution_result_T007: Created three HTML files (about.html, products.html, contact.html) with basic structure, meta tags, dark theme, Tailwind CSS, and Flowbite via CDN.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Created hero section with fullscreen background image, overlay, text content, and dark theme CTA button linked to contact.html, all styled with Tailwind CSS. Ensure the content is centered and visually appealing.
globals_schema.execution_result_T003: Created a responsive features section with 3 feature cards, icons from Font Awesome, titles, descriptions, and Tailwind CSS styling for dark theme.  Features a grid layout that adapts to different screen sizes.
globals_schema.execution_result_T004: Created testimonials section with 3 testimonial cards using Tailwind CSS for dark theme, ready to be integrated into index.html
globals_schema.execution_result_T005: Created a detailed footer section with social media icons, links to other pages, and copyright information, styled with Tailwind CSS classes for the dark theme.

nodes.description: Generate the base HTML structure for index.html using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS CDN, including dark theme setup.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed HTML file named index.html. Use Flowbite and Tailwind CSS via CDN for styling. Implement a dark theme. Include basic HTML structure (doctype, html, head, body). Add meta tags for responsiveness and viewport settings. Set the title to 'Modern Dark Theme Landing Page'. Link Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CSS via CDN. Add an empty header and footer section. Ensure the dark theme is applied correctly using Tailwind CSS dark mode classes. Do NOT add any actual content inside the header and body, this will be implemented later.

files.index.html: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en" class="dark"><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><title>Modern Dark Theme Landing Page</title><link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet"><link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /></head><body class="bg-gray-900 text-white"><header class="dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white"></header><main></main><footer class="dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white"></footer><script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script></body></html>

output.execution_result_T001: Created a basic HTML structure with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links, applying a dark theme.

nodes.description: Create the hero section for index.html with a fullscreen background image and a call to action.
nodes.agent_prompt: Enhance the index.html file (code_step_T001) with a hero section. Use a fullscreen background image from https://picsum.photos/200/300.  Add an overlay to darken the image for better text readability.  Include a heading, a short descriptive paragraph, and a call-to-action button (CTA) linked to the contact page.  Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (text color, font size, button appearance, spacing, alignment). Ensure the content is centered and visually appealing. Remember the file is to be named index.html and link to contact.html page. Only generate the HTML for the hero section, I'll be linking it back later. The button should have a dark theme.

files.index.html:
Welcome to Our Website

Discover amazing things with us.

Contact Us

output.execution_result_T002: Created hero section with fullscreen background image, overlay, text content, and dark theme CTA button linked to contact.html, all styled with Tailwind CSS. Ensure the content is centered and visually appealing.

nodes.description: Implement the features section in index.html with icon, title and description.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a features section to index.html (code_step_T001).  Include 3-4 feature cards. Each card should have an icon (choose relevant icons from Flowbite or Font Awesome), a title, and a short descriptive paragraph.  Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (card appearance, icon color, text color, spacing, alignment). Ensure the features are displayed in a visually appealing manner, preferably using a grid layout. Only generate the HTML for the feature cards section, I'll be linking it back later. Ensure dark theme styles are applied. Make sure this grid scales well on smaller screens. Each feature needs a title, description, and a Font Awesome icon.

files.features.html:
Key Features

Blazing Fast

Experience lightning-fast performance with our optimized infrastructure.

Unbreakable Security

Protect your data with our advanced encryption and security protocols.

Real-Time Analytics

Gain valuable insights with our real-time data analytics dashboard.

Clean Code

Well designed and easy to understand code

output.execution_result_T003: Created a responsive features section with 3 feature cards, icons from Font Awesome, titles, descriptions, and Tailwind CSS styling for dark theme.  Features a grid layout that adapts to different screen sizes.

nodes.description: Develop the testimonials section for index.html including client review cards.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a testimonials section in index.html (code_step_T001). Include 2-3 testimonial cards. Each card should contain a client's quote, their name, and a small profile picture (use placeholder images if necessary). Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (card appearance, text color, spacing, alignment). Consider using a slider or carousel for displaying the testimonials. Only generate the HTML for the testimonials section, I'll be linking it back later. Ensure dark theme styles are applied.

files.testimonials.html:
Testimonials

"This service has been a game-changer for our business. Highly recommended!"

- John Doe, CEO

"Incredible value and outstanding customer support. Couldn't be happier."

- Jane Smith, Marketing Manager

"The best investment we've made. It has streamlined our workflow significantly."

- Peter Jones, CTO

output.execution_result_T004: Created testimonials section with 3 testimonial cards using Tailwind CSS for dark theme, ready to be integrated into index.html

nodes.description: Create the footer for index.html with social icons, links, and copyright information.
nodes.agent_prompt: Design a detailed footer section for index.html (code_step_T001). Include social media icons (use Font Awesome or Flowbite icons), links to other pages (about, products, contact), and copyright information. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (background color, text color, spacing, alignment). Ensure the footer is consistent with the overall dark theme. Only generate the HTML for the footer section, I'll be linking it back later. Make sure the footer links correctly to other pages.

files.footer.html:
AboutProductsContact

© 2024 My Website. All rights reserved.

output.execution_result_T005: Created a detailed footer section with social media icons, links to other pages, and copyright information, styled with Tailwind CSS classes for the dark theme.

nodes.description: Assemble the complete index.html page by combining the generated sections and ensuring proper linking.
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the HTML code from the following steps into a single, complete, and well-formatted HTML file named index.html: code_step_T001 (base structure), code_step_T002 (hero section), code_step_T003 (features section), code_step_T004 (testimonials section), and code_step_T005 (footer section). Ensure that all sections are properly integrated and styled to maintain a consistent dark theme using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite. All assets and links MUST be linked locally in order for the other assets to load. Create the full html file including head and body. This is the MOST IMPORTANT task. Ensure the dark theme is consistent across all sections. Make sure the links (hero, footer, header) links to the correct pages.

nodes.description: Generate the base HTML structure for about.html, products.html, and contact.html pages with dark theme and CDN links.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create three detailed HTML files: about.html, products.html, and contact.html. Use Flowbite and Tailwind CSS via CDN for styling and implement a dark theme. Include basic HTML structure (doctype, html, head, body). Add meta tags for responsiveness and viewport settings. Set appropriate titles for each page ('About Us', 'Products', 'Contact'). Link Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CSS via CDN. Add empty header and footer sections. Ensure the dark theme is applied correctly using Tailwind CSS dark mode classes. Do NOT add any actual content inside the header and body, this will be implemented later.

files.about.html: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><title>About Us</title><link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet"><link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /></head><body class="bg-gray-900 text-white dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white"><header></header><main></main><footer></footer><script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script></body></html>
files.products.html: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><title>Products</title><link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet"><link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /></head><body class="bg-gray-900 text-white dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white"><header></header><main></main><footer></footer><script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script></body></html>
files.contact.html: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"><title>Contact</title><link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet"><link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /></head><body class="bg-gray-900 text-white dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white"><header></header><main></main><footer></footer><script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script></body></html>

output.execution_result_T007: Created three HTML files (about.html, products.html, contact.html) with basic structure, meta tags, dark theme, Tailwind CSS, and Flowbite via CDN.

nodes.description: Implement the header to be shared across the website, and ensure proper linking across all 4 pages.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a reusable header section that will be included in all four HTML files (index.html (code_step_T006), about.html, products.html, and contact.html (code_step_T007)). The header should include the website logo, navigation links to each of the four pages, and a consistent dark theme styling using Tailwind CSS. Ensure that the links point to the correct HTML files: index.html, about.html, products.html, and contact.html.  Generate the HTML for the header section only. Each file MUST be linked locally. Remember to link the files with `./about.html` and not `/about.html`. The pages must be in the same directory!

nodes.description: Implement the mission statement and timeline/values sections within about.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Enhance the about.html file (code_step_T007) with a mission statement section and a timeline or values section. The mission statement should clearly articulate the company's purpose. The timeline or values section should present the company's history or core values in a visually appealing manner. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (text color, font size, spacing, alignment). Ensure the dark theme styles are applied. Generate the HTML for these two sections only.

nodes.description: Implement the team cards section within about.html to display team member information.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a team cards section to about.html (code_step_T007).  Include 2-3 team member cards. Each card should have a team member's name, job title, a brief bio, and a profile picture (use placeholder images if necessary). Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (card appearance, text color, spacing, alignment). Ensure dark theme styles are applied. Generate the HTML for the team cards section only.

nodes.description: Assemble the complete about.html page by integrating the header, mission, timeline, and team sections.
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the HTML code from the following steps into a single, complete, and well-formatted HTML file named about.html: code_step_T007 (base structure), code_step_T008 (header section), code_step_T009 (mission and timeline sections), and code_step_T010 (team cards section). Ensure that all sections are properly integrated and styled to maintain a consistent dark theme using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite. Ensure correct file path links to make sure they load properly.

nodes.description: Create the product/service cards section for products.html, displaying 6-8 cards in a grid.
nodes.agent_prompt: Design a product/service cards section for products.html (code_step_T007). Display 6-8 product/service cards in a grid layout. Each card should have a title, a short description, an image (use placeholder images if necessary), a price, and optional filters. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (card appearance, text color, spacing, alignment). Ensure the cards are responsive and visually appealing. Only generate the HTML for the product cards section, I'll be linking it back later. Do not use Lorem Ipsum text. Make sure it scales well on smaller devices.

nodes.description: Assemble the complete products.html page by integrating the header and product cards sections.
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the HTML code from the following steps into a single, complete, and well-formatted HTML file named products.html: code_step_T007 (base structure), code_step_T008 (header section), and code_step_T012 (product/service cards section). Ensure that all sections are properly integrated and styled to maintain a consistent dark theme using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite. Ensure correct file path links to make sure they load properly.

nodes.description: Implement the contact form in contact.html with name, email, and message fields.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a contact form in contact.html (code_step_T007). Include fields for name, email, and message. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (form appearance, text color, spacing, alignment).  Generate the HTML for the contact form only. Ensure dark theme styles are applied.

nodes.description: Add a map placeholder or location card and support links to contact.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a map placeholder or location card and support links to contact.html (code_step_T007).  If using a map, use a placeholder image. The location card should display address and contact details. Support links should point to helpful resources. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling (card appearance, text color, spacing, alignment). Generate the HTML for these sections only. Ensure dark theme styles are applied.

nodes.description: Assemble the complete contact.html page by integrating the header, contact form, location, and support sections.
nodes.agent_prompt: Combine the HTML code from the following steps into a single, complete, and well-formatted HTML file named contact.html: code_step_T007 (base structure), code_step_T008 (header section), code_step_T014 (contact form), and code_step_T015 (location and support sections). Ensure that all sections are properly integrated and styled to maintain a consistent dark theme using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite. Ensure correct file path links to make sure they load properly.

nodes.description: Integrate the reusable footer into the about.html, products.html, and contact.html pages.
nodes.agent_prompt: Incorporate the generated footer from code_step_T005 into the about.html (code_step_T011), products.html (code_step_T013), and contact.html (code_step_T016) pages. Ensure that the footer is correctly placed and styled to match the dark theme using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite. Ensure correct file path links to make sure they load properly.
